com.phonytive.astive.agi.command
Class SpeechRecognize

java.lang.Object
  com.phonytive.astive.agi.command.SpeechRecognize
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class SpeechRecognize
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable

Plays back given prompt while listening for speech and DTMF.

Since:
1.0.0
See Also:
Serialized Form

          Creates a new SpeechRecognizeCommand object that plays the given prompt and listens for for speech and DTMF.
